views.markdown:
Update for Snapchat 10.11.5+ Fix crash on -[SCChat allSnapsArray] Use -[SCChat lastSnap] to figure out emoji since SOJUFriendmoji class exists Supports Snapchat 10.x.x on iOS 10 or below

Use UserNotificationServices/SpringBoardServices PrivateFrameworks to handle notifications in streaknotifyd

Change entitlements of streaknotifyd to allow usernotification/localnotification

Update method definitions SCFeed refreshDidFinish

Add more bootstrap IPC mechanisms
Fix crash in Snapchat 10.2+
FetchUpdates() function in MainViewController caused crash
Updated code to handle release/debug

Fix RemoteNotifications by removing a FetchUpdates() call 2nd fix for -[Friend snapStreakCount] still returning a non-zero value after streak ends
SendViewController cells were still returning negative values right after a streak ends
Supposed to be fixed in 2.10.1
Fix when streak is over but -[Friend snapStreakCount] still returns a non-zero value
This is fixed by comparing the expirationTimeValue in the SOJUFriendmoji class to the current date. So if the Friend class returns a non-reliable value we don't have any problems with negative time remaining shown in a tableview (since the streak is over)
Todo this the process of configuring the labels is split into many functions so that each value returned is an input to the next function.


Small bug fixes
Note: BulletinBoard coming soon


Fix conflict with SCReplyButton in Stories and Feed
Fix bug in GetTimeRemaining if chat convo gets deleted (use lastSnap member from SCChat class if SOJUFriendmoji class exists)
Reset notifications in background thread
Many more bug fixes
Updated screenshots for the new Snapchat interface


Fixed FriendmojiList load fail because systemcall to access file in root directory from userspace fails
Move streaknotifyd dictionary from /var/root/Documents to /var/mobile/Documents
Increase width of UILabel inside UITableViewCell to adjust for long strings (for exact time remaining)
Align UILabel's to the right so that they are fixed underneath the friendmojiview


Use SOJUFriendmojis class found in friendmojis property in Friends to figure out exact time when streak ends Note: this particular method is the EXACT time when the streak will end. The previous versions use a +24 hour period from the earliest unreplied snap to notify

Add show exact time when streak ends option in settings

Add General section in preferences bundle


Add Close Snapchat to Preferences Bundle, so that one doesn't necessarily have to respring to see changes in their prefs
Add code to handle friendmojilist save plist when Preferences application moves to background

Fix exit on FriendmojiList (wasn't a crash)
Added UIAlertController to diagnose bug


Integration with SCSelectRecipientsView
Added hook to handle SelectContactCell and it's subNameLabel property
Support for Snapchat 9.45.x primarily (not tested on other versions)


Fix crash on Manager fetch updates on Snapchat 9.45.x
Fix disappear of timers on Snapchat 9.45.x
Fix timer not showing up in Snapchat 9.42.x
Choose image action works and saves image
Code optimizations
Updated logs to show if timer won't show up
AutoReply is not working still
Todo - include caption option for autoreply and implement snap send


Change back to PSViewController from PSListController
iOS 9.3 SDK -> 9.0 because it couldn't link that class
Should work on 9.40.x (9.41.x not tested yet)
Autoreply still being worked on (school)
Fix crash on Manager fetch updates + completion handler (9.40.x)
Remove command in package to remove plist for Preferences Bundle
Previous Snapchat versions are not supported
Todo list: still working on auto reply (Snapchat mitigations makes it hard, will investigate further when I'm done with classes later in the semester)
Fix sizing with unreplied streak labels (1 liner)

Fix crash on SCMyContactsViewController
Include timer emoji for replied streaks
Fix notifications
Note: auto reply does not work yet, don't ask about it

Fix crash when sending snap to multiple users

Fix crash in Snapchat 9.34.x
Fix another change Snapchat made in 9.35
Add support for other view controllers (Contacts, Stories, etc)
Fix all issues related to streaknotifyd
Add respring button
Add disable StreakNotify option (if an update breaks)
Startup support for auto reply
Fix crash due to Preferences plist, if you open the Snapchat app from the background it used to crash because the preferences object was released.

Note: Preferences settings for tweak do not change unless you close the app and restart the Snapchat app. Will submit an update to my repo and BigBoss soon to allow preferences to reload after coming from background [need to fix bug]

Check if the /var/root/Documents folder is present and reload preferences every time app opens from background
Fix force close on FriendmojiList-Custom Friends (wasn't a crash)

All versions of Snapchat are compatible
